DOC.brief_summary: All patient undergo arthroscopy arthroplasty temporomandibular joint dysfunction complete psychological questionnaire prior surgery . The 3 month outcome include pain function examine use regression analysis identify psychological variable may predict outcome .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Psychological Parameters That May Influence Outcome Following Arthroscopy Arthroplasty Temporomandibular Joint Surgery
DOC.criteria: require arthroscopy arthroplasty age le 18 yr prior surgery unable give inform consent
